snippet: The American International Group will sell up to 90 percent of its airplane leasing unit, the International Lease Finance Corporation, in a deal that values the business at $5.28 billion.
abstract: The American International Group will sell up to 90 percent of its airplane leasing unit, the International Lease Finance Corporation, in a deal that values the business at $5.28 billion.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: A.I.G. to Sell Most of Leasing Unit to Chinese Investors
headline.print_headline: Chinese Group Agrees To Buy a Unit of A.I.G.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
